revision.text: :''The following is an archived discussion of a [[Wikipedia:featured list candidates|featured list nomination]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made on the article's talk page or in [[Wikipedia talk:Featured list candidates]]. No further edits should be made to this page.'' The list was '''promoted''' by [[User:Giants2008|Giants2008]] 17:11, 4 September 2012 [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=510783989]. ---- ===[[Mystikal discography]]=== {{la|Mystikal discography}} {{Wikipedia:Featured list tools|1=Mystikal discography}} :''Nominator(s): [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 12:42, 8 August 2012 (UTC)'' I am nominating this for featured list because I have worked extensively on it to ensure that it meets the criteria for a featured list, which I have based on the previous discographies I've worked on. Any criticism would be welcome if it improves the page. [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 12:42, 8 August 2012 (UTC) {{hidden/FC|headerstyle=background:#ccf;|contentstyle=border:1px #ccf solid; padding:10px;|header=Resolved comments from [[User:Calvin999|Calvin999]] ([[User talk:Calvin999|talk]]) 11:13, 17 July 2012 (UTC)|content='''Comments by Calvin999''' *I've gone through the article and the tables are really well formatted, look very clear and concise. References looks good also. There are no dablink problems but there are [http://toolserver.org/~dispenser/cgi-bin/webchecklinks.py?page=Mystikal_discography two dead links]. Pending this issue is resolved I will support the proposal of this list. [[User:Calvin999|'''Aaron ''']]• [[User talk:Calvin999|'''You ''''''Da ''''''One''']] 16:34, 18 August 2012 (UTC) :I've fixed the charts.de link, but the Vevo link (see it yourself [http://www.vevo.com/artist/mystikal?source=lucenesearch here]) seems to actually be live even though Toolserver is labelling it as dead. [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 17:32, 18 August 2012 (UTC)}} * '''Support''' [[User:Calvin999|'''Aaron ''']]• [[User talk:Calvin999|'''You ''''''Da ''''''One''']] 17:55, 18 August 2012 (UTC) {{hidden/FC|headerstyle=background:#ccf;|contentstyle=border:1px #ccf solid; padding:10px;|header=Resolved comments from [[User:The Rambling Man|The Rambling Man]] ([[User talk:The Rambling Man|talk]]) 13:23, 25 August 2012 (UTC)|content='''Comments''' *Lead and infobox disagree with each other. *Third sentence (starting with "Following his...") has too many run-on clauses... *"in the top 5 of " top five. *"After Mystikal began serving a prison " maybe "While Mystikal served a prison..."? *"so far " need a timeframe for that. *Where are the release dates referenced and which country/countries are they relevant to? *Use a better link for the Kiss of the Dragon link, e.g. [[Kiss of the Dragon#Soundtrack]]. *Allmusic->AllMusic. [[User:The Rambling Man|The Rambling Man]] ([[User talk:The Rambling Man|talk]]) 12:12, 22 August 2012 (UTC) :All (hopefully) '''done'''. [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 12:54, 22 August 2012 (UTC) :*Where are the release dates referenced and which country/countries are they relevant to? [[User:The Rambling Man|The Rambling Man]] ([[User talk:The Rambling Man|talk]]) 16:06, 22 August 2012 (UTC) ::Do you mean for the dates in the tables, or in the lead? [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 16:20, 22 August 2012 (UTC) :::Tables. [[User:The Rambling Man|The Rambling Man]] ([[User talk:The Rambling Man|talk]]) 16:32, 22 August 2012 (UTC) ::::'''Done''' [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 17:04, 22 August 2012 (UTC) :::::Is that always the US release date? If so, note it, if not, not which release where... [[User:The Rambling Man|The Rambling Man]] ([[User talk:The Rambling Man|talk]]) 17:07, 22 August 2012 (UTC) ::::::AllMusic does use the American release dates: indicated this in the tables (apologies if this is becoming exasperating). [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 06:40, 23 August 2012 (UTC)}} *'''Support'''--[[User:GreatOrangePumpkin|Kürbis]] ([[User talk:GreatOrangePumpkin|✔]]) 16:57, 25 August 2012 (UTC) {{hidden/FC|headerstyle=background:#ccf;|contentstyle=border:1px #ccf solid; padding:10px;|header=Resolved comments from [[User:Holiday56|Holiday56]] ([[User talk:Holiday56|talk]]) 13:30, 30 August 2012 (UTC)|content='''Comments''' *"Mystikal's following two studio albums, ''Unpredictable'' and ''Ghetto Fabulous'', were both released on the record label No Limit Records (Jive distributed the album rather than No Limit's parent label, Priority Records) and both peaked in the top five of the ''Billboard'' 200 and were later certified platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA)." :A run-on is present in this sentence. Perhaps a change to: :"Mystikal's following two studio albums, ''Unpredictable'' and ''Ghetto Fabulous'', were both released on the record label No Limit Records; Jive distributed the album rather than No Limit's parent label, Priority Records. Both peaked in the top five of the ''Billboard'' 200 and were later certified platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA)." *"It peaked at 37" → "It peaked at number 37" *Since ''Mystikal'' is still a studio album, perhaps make the independent albums section a subsection of the studio albums section. **Table caption for the "Independent albums" section could be made more specific: "List of independent albums, with some notes" → "List of independent studio albums, with some notes". :'''Done''' [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 13:30, 30 August 2012 (UTC) *Any reason why "Original" has a source in the singles section? It has charted, after all. *No need to capitalize "The" in "The Netherlands". *No need to italicize "[Original Soundtrack]" in the AllMusic reference for "The Edge of the Blade". *Piped link for "Bubbling Under R&B/Hip-Hop Singles" should point to "[[Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs#Bubbling Under R&B/Hip-Hop Singles]]". [[User:Holiday56|Holiday56]] ([[User talk:Holiday56|talk]]) 12:23, 30 August 2012 (UTC) : All '''Done'''. [[User:Sufur222|'''I Am Rufus''']] • [[User talk:Sufur222|Conversation is a beautiful thing.]] 12:40, 30 August 2012 (UTC)}} *'''Support''', as my comments have now been addressed. [[User:Holiday56|Holiday56]] ([[User talk:Holiday56|talk]]) 13:31, 30 August 2012 (UTC) *'''Support''' [[User:NapHit|NapHit]] ([[User talk:NapHit|talk]]) 15:37, 1 September 2012 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive. '''Please do not modify it.''' No further edits should be made to this page.''
